1.title: Welcome to Time Force Academy
1.plot: In the year 3016, Time Force Officer, Jen Scotts, is teaching a class of cadets when the Time Force Academy suddenly comes under attack. Now along with her students and a beat Time Force Officer, they must defend the Academy.

2.title: It's Morphin Time!
2.plot: After adjusting to their new roles and getting better acquainted with their new Time Ship, the Hyper Force rangers travel to 1994, Angel Grove. In order to search for the Alliance and their Leader, during the Halloween festivities.

3.title: Whatever Happened to Scorpina?
3.plot: After a devastating battle, The Hyper Force rangers must defend against The Alliance Leader's attacks on the Time ship while trying to save Jack's life. The time line is also under threat as a alteration is detect by the Time Ship.

4.title: Aisha Campbell Returns!
4.plot: After dealing with the aftermath in the Library, the Hyper Force Rangers are contacted by Zordon, who sends one of his rangers of the time to assist them. Now they must head to Italy to stop Scorpina and Vulcanos' plan.

5.title: We Need Megazord Power!
5.plot: With only three hours before Scorpina disappearance from the time-line becomes permanent, the Hyper Force Rangers work on repairing the Time ship. However, Zordon needs their help when a monster attacks while his rangers are off-world.

6.title: Vesper's Betrayal
6.plot: The Hyper Force Rangers continue traveling with refugees to Corinth city after being trapped in an apocalyptic time due to a heavily damaged Time ship. The Rangers soon find themselves protecting the refugees from the threats of this world.

7.title: It's Boom Time
7.plot: Now captured, the rangers must figure out how to escape and save one of their own from being controlled by Venjix. To their surprise, they end up meeting another ranger, who is also being held captive, to help them.

8.title: Holiday Special
8.plot: Much time has past and the Rangers continue preparing themselves to continue their pursuit of the Alliance. However, Marv, Eddie, Vesper, and Chloe are forcefully teleported to the North Pole on Christmas Eve in the year 1985.

9.title: Dr. Tommy Oliver Returns!
9.plot: After finishing their Christmas adventure, Jack arrives with the Time Ship along with a legendary Ranger. The Rangers then travel to 2005, Reefside after detecting The Alliance Leader and finding out what he has planned.

10.title: Family
10.plot: The Hyper Force rangers detect a disturbance on the other side of Reefside. There they confront Scorpina and manage to capture her but the Hyper Force rangers soon find themselves facing against a strange occurrence on the Time ship.

11.title: A Ranger in King Arthur's Court
11.plot: Chloe, Eddie, Jack, and Vesper encounter Knights while being stranded in the 6th Century. They are escorted to Camelot where they explain their situation. The Rangers' help is then requested in exchange for repairing the Time Ship.

12.title: Save Marv
12.plot: Three days have past and Marv is looking for a way to escape as he is being held captive by the Alliance leader. Now the other Rangers have left the Hyper stream and are in hot pursuit of the Alliance ship in the Time stream.

13.title: What Happened to Rita Repulsa
13.plot: While Vesper is napping, Eddie, Marv, and Chloe struggle with the effects and outcomes of recent events. However, when a time anomaly is detected in the year 2005, the Rangers travel to the town of Briarwood to investigate.

14.title: SPD Emergency
14.plot: The Hyper Force rangers arrive in Newtech City, 2025 and begin their search for Marv's brother, Joe. While looking for Joe, they soon come in contact with the Law enforcement of this era, SPD.

15.title: Absorption
15.plot: Now the Rangers have found who they are looking for, they must establish whether "Maxwell" is undercover or actually working for the enemy. The Rangers also have a hard time finding a way to take back the Proton Accelerator from Napoleon.

16.title: Homecoming
16.plot: The Hyper Force Rangers follow the stolen time ship from 2025 to 2027 and travel to another planet called Planet Y37. Their pursuit leads them to correctional facility that the Alliance Leader raids.

17.title: Director Ransik
17.plot: The synthetic organisms found at the ruins of Dr. Fericks' lab are consumed with their hate for Ransik but since he is no longer the mutant he once was, the Rangers must find a way to stop their plans for revenge.

18.title: Stage 4: The Armada
18.plot: Following a new lead, the HyperForce rangers travel to the planet Andresia, during the year 2013, in order to find out more about the Warstar Armada from a Legendary Ranger.

19.title: Shattered Grid Part 1
19.plot: While travelling through the Hyper Stream, a dark energy is detected entering the stream from the normal time stream. The Hyperforce rangers decide to investigate but find themselves in a familiar city in a darker world.

20.title: Shattered Grid Part 2
20.plot: The Rangers find themselves facing Lord Drakkon straight after the brutal aftermath of their recent fight. Using "Coinless" soldiers as hostages, Drakkon forces them to submit and help stop Scorpina from taking control of Serpentera.

21.title: Enter The Green Ranger
21.plot: The Hyperforce rangers are left confused with no memory of their time in Drakkon's universe. They soon discover they have received multiple messages from Joe Shih with a surprising announcement along with invitations to a wedding.

22.title: Fight for the Corona Aurora
22.plot: The Sentinel Knight agrees to train Marv in order to help him become stronger, however, during their training session, they are attacked by The Alliance Leader and his monsters in a attempt to steal the Corona Aurora.

23.title: Rebirth... Kind Of
23.plot: The Alliance leader deals a deadly blow to the rangers as one loses their life. He proceeds to pressure them for the Corona Aurora but will they give in to his demands to retrieve their friend's body and find a way to bring her back.

24.title: Finale: Part 1
24.plot: The alliance make their move to change the time line and alter history by crashing the United Alliance of Evil meeting that Andro, the red space ranger, is present in disguise. The Hyperforce Rangers make a plan to stop them.

25.title: Finale: Part 2
25.plot: The time ships, stolen by the Alliance, attempt to escape with Zordon but the Hyperforce rangers are in hot pursuit. Using the inner voice Chloe is hearing in her mind to guide them, they storm the ship Chloe believes contains Zordon.

imdb.plot outline: Set in the year 3016 at Time Force Academy, a team of Time Force cadets and a beat Time Force Officer must band together when their mentor, Jen Scott ( The Pink Time Force Ranger), and the Time Force Academy comes under attack. They soon gain Morphers to become the Hyper Force Power Rangers in order to defeat an Alliance of evil who is set on unraveling the very fabric of the universe. With the show's Game Master, Malika Lim, the Hyper Force Rangers will cross both time and space, in their state-of-the-art Time Ship, to complete their mission. The stakes have never been higher as the players learn what it means to be a Ranger in a live, tabletop RPG environment where anything can happen.
imdb.title: Power Rangers HyperForce
plot: Set in the year 3016 at Time Force Academy, a team of Time Force cadets and a beat Time Force Officer must band together when their mentor, Jen Scott ( The Pink Time Force Ranger), and the Time Force Academy comes under attack. They soon gain Morphers to become the Hyper Force Power Rangers in order to defeat an Alliance of evil who is set on unraveling the very fabric of the universe. With the show's Game Master, Malika Lim, the Hyper Force Rangers will cross both time and space, in their state-of-the-art Time Ship, to complete their mission. The stakes have never been higher as the players learn what it means to be a Ranger in a live, tabletop RPG environment where anything can happen.
